txt.en: Dwarf-made treasure can be found on chests, packs, and corpses throughout Gundabad.\n\nYou should return to Bráthi when you have collected enough dwarf-made treasures.

'There are a fair number of old trinkets and treasures to be found in Gundabad. I am sure there are some to be found in forgotten chests and on the corpses of unlucky adventurers. If you recover any on your travels in Gundabad, I would very much like them, my friend!'
Bráthi the Master Prospector is in search of rare treasures in Gundabad.
'Thank you! These lost treasures are indeed a thing of beauty and each has a story to tell! Well done!'
Deliver the dwarf-made treasure to Bráthi
